category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEClosureRuleEditorDefaultClosureRules
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of closure rules which will be available in Closure Rule Editor view of Manufacturing Process Planner (MPP). Valid values are the closure rule names used for Briefcase export. The default value is "TIEExportDefaultCR".
